segment.source: A text entry box that provides suggestions as the user types.
segment.target: A text entry box that provides suggestions as the user types.

segment.source: Guidelines for auto-suggest boxes
segment.target: Guidelines for auto-suggest boxes

segment.source: Auto-suggest box
segment.target: Auto-suggest box

segment.source: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.
segment.target: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.

segment.source: An auto suggest box
segment.target: An auto suggest box

segment.target: Important APIs

segment.target: AutoSuggestBox class

segment.target: SuggestionChose event

segment.target: QuerySubmitted event

segment.source: Is this the right control?
segment.target: Is this the right control?

segment.source: If you'd like a simple, customizable control that allows text search with a list of suggestions, then choose an auto-suggest box.
segment.target: If you'd like a simple, customizable control that allows text search with a list of suggestions, then choose an auto-suggest box.

segment.source: For more info about choosing the right text control, see the Text controls article.
segment.target: For more info about choosing the right text control, see the Text controls article.

segment.source: Examples
segment.target: Examples

segment.source: An auto suggest box in the Groove Music app.
segment.target: An auto suggest box in the Groove Music app.

segment.source: An auto suggest box in the Groove Music app
segment.target: An auto suggest box in the Groove Music app

segment.source: Anatomy
segment.target: Anatomy

segment.source: The entry point for the auto-suggest box consists of an optional header and a text box with optional hint text:
segment.target: The entry point for the auto-suggest box consists of an optional header and a text box with optional hint text:

segment.source: Example of the entry point for auto-suggest control
segment.target: Example of the entry point for auto-suggest control

segment.source: The auto-suggest results list populates automatically once the user starts to enter text.
segment.target: The auto-suggest results list populates automatically once the user starts to enter text.

segment.source: The results list can appear above or below the text entry box.
segment.target: The results list can appear above or below the text entry box.

segment.source: A "clear all" button appears:
segment.target: A "clear all" button appears:

segment.source: Example of the expanded auto-suggest control
segment.target: Example of the expanded auto-suggest control

segment.source: Create an auto-suggest box
segment.target: Create an auto-suggest box

segment.source: To use an AutoSuggestBox, you need to respond to 3 user actions.
segment.target: To use an AutoSuggestBox, you need to respond to 3 user actions.

segment.source: Text changed - When the user enters text, update the suggestion list.
segment.target: Text changed - When the user enters text, update the suggestion list.

segment.source: Suggestion chosen - When the user chooses a suggestion in the suggestion list, update the text box.
segment.target: Suggestion chosen - When the user chooses a suggestion in the suggestion list, update the text box.

segment.source: Query submitted - When the user submits a query, show the query results.
segment.target: Query submitted - When the user submits a query, show the query results.

segment.source: Text changed
segment.target: Text changed

segment.source: The TextChanged event occurs whenever the content of the text box is updated.
segment.target: The TextChanged event occurs whenever the content of the text box is updated.

segment.source: Use the event args Reason property to determine whether the change was due to user input.
segment.target: Use the event args Reason property to determine whether the change was due to user input.

segment.source: If the change reason is UserInput, filter your data based on the input.
segment.target: If the change reason is UserInput, filter your data based on the input.

segment.source: Then, set the filtered data as the ItemsSource of the AutoSuggestBox to update the suggestion list.
segment.target: Then, set the filtered data as the ItemsSource of the AutoSuggestBox to update the suggestion list.

segment.source: To control how items are displayed in the suggestion list, you can use DisplayMemberPath or ItemTemplate.
segment.target: To control how items are displayed in the suggestion list, you can use DisplayMemberPath or ItemTemplate.

segment.source: To display the text of a single property of your data item, set the DisplayMemberPath property to choose which property from your object to display in the suggestion list.
segment.target: To display the text of a single property of your data item, set the DisplayMemberPath property to choose which property from your object to display in the suggestion list.

segment.source: To define a custom look for each item in the list, use the ItemTemplate property.
segment.target: To define a custom look for each item in the list, use the ItemTemplate property.

segment.source: Suggestion chosen
segment.target: Suggestion chosen

segment.source: When a user navigates through the suggestion list using the keyboard, you need to update the text in the text box to match.
segment.target: When a user navigates through the suggestion list using the keyboard, you need to update the text in the text box to match.

segment.source: You can set the TextMemberPath property to choose which property from your data object to display in the text box.
segment.target: You can set the TextMemberPath property to choose which property from your data object to display in the text box.

segment.source: If you specify a TextMemberPath, the text box is updated automatically.
segment.target: If you specify a TextMemberPath, the text box is updated automatically.

segment.source: You should typically specify the same value for DisplayMemberPath and TextMemberPath so the text is the same in the suggestion list and the text box.
segment.target: You should typically specify the same value for DisplayMemberPath and TextMemberPath so the text is the same in the suggestion list and the text box.

segment.source: If you need to show more than a simple property, handle the SuggestionChosen event to populate the text box with custom text based on the selected item.
segment.target: If you need to show more than a simple property, handle the SuggestionChosen event to populate the text box with custom text based on the selected item.

segment.source: Query submitted
segment.target: Query submitted

segment.source: Handle the QuerySubmitted event to perform a query action appropriate to your app and show the result to the user.
segment.target: Handle the QuerySubmitted event to perform a query action appropriate to your app and show the result to the user.

segment.source: The QuerySubmitted event occurs when a user commits a query string.
segment.target: The QuerySubmitted event occurs when a user commits a query string.

segment.source: The user can commit a query in one of these ways:
segment.target: The user can commit a query in one of these ways:

segment.source: While the focus is in the text box, press Enter or click the query icon.
segment.target: While the focus is in the text box, press Enter or click the query icon.

segment.source: The event args ChosenSuggestion property is null.
segment.target: The event args ChosenSuggestion property is null.

segment.source: While the focus is in the suggestion list, press Enter, click, or tap an item.
segment.target: While the focus is in the suggestion list, press Enter, click, or tap an item.

segment.source: The event args ChosenSuggestion property contains the item that was selected from the list.
segment.target: The event args ChosenSuggestion property contains the item that was selected from the list.

segment.source: In all cases, the event args QueryText property contains the text from the text box.
segment.target: In all cases, the event args QueryText property contains the text from the text box.

segment.source: Use AutoSuggestBox for search
segment.target: Use AutoSuggestBox for search

segment.source: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.
segment.target: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.

segment.source: By default, the text entry box doesn’t have a query button shown.
segment.target: By default, the text entry box doesn’t have a query button shown.

segment.source: You can set the QueryIcon property to add a button with the specified icon on the right side of the text box.
segment.target: You can set the QueryIcon property to add a button with the specified icon on the right side of the text box.

segment.source: For example, to make the AutoSuggestBox look like a typical search box, add a ‘find’ icon, like this.
segment.target: For example, to make the AutoSuggestBox look like a typical search box, add a ‘find’ icon, like this.

segment.source: Here's an AutoSuggestBox with a 'find' icon.
segment.target: Here's an AutoSuggestBox with a 'find' icon.

segment.target: Example of the entry point for auto-suggest control

segment.target: To see a complete working examples of AutoSuggestBox, see the AutoSuggestBox migration sample and XAML UI Basics sample.

segment.target: Here is a simple AutoSuggestBox with the required event handlers.

segment.source: Recommendations
segment.target: Recommendations

segment.source: When using the auto-suggest box to perform searches and no search results exist for the entered text, display a single-line "No results" message as the result so that users know their search request executed:
segment.target: When using the auto-suggest box to perform searches and no search results exist for the entered text, display a single-line "No results" message as the result so that users know their search request executed:

segment.source: Example of an auto suggest box with no search results
segment.target: Example of an auto suggest box with no search results
